snippet.title: Re-Port From Portugal, And The Splashiest New Hotel In The World
snippet.description: I am back in Porto, my fourth glorious visit in five years: half a decade of understanding the funky wackiness of northern Portuguese food, half a decade of giving myself over entirely to the unusual aesthetic of Port wine. snippet.title: IBM Smarter Planet​Voice: From Shopping To Space Travel, How The Mainframe Changed Our World
snippet.description: The release of the first mainframe computer, System 360, 50 years ago sparked a revolution in computing and business processes that still affects consumers daily. In fact, most people can't function more than a few hours without taking advantage of something that the mainframe provides, but everyone takes for granted. read »
